oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Copy print of children of Sgt. Robert Johnson, Co. I, 48h Tenn. Inf. Regt. (Voorhies), CSA
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: These are the children of Confederate veteran Sgt. Robert Johnson, Co. I, 48th Tenn. Inf. Regt. (Voorhies), CSA. Johnson was living in Haywood County, Tenn. at the time of the war but enlisted in the 48th Tenn. Inf. in Lawrence County, Tennessee. The young ladies in the photograph all appear to be riding side saddle.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Blackwell, Mable Johnson; Johnson, Marmaduke Johnson, Jr., Robert; Raymond Johnson, Rebecca ; Johnson, Eva
